_comment: This is an example API configuration file. Copy this to api-config.json and customize for your needs.

defaultRequestBody.headerPrompt: You are a helpful AI assistant for [YOUR COMPANY]. Answer questions based on the provided context and be helpful, accurate, and professional.
defaultRequestBody.footerPrompt: Always base your answers on the provided context. If the context doesn't contain enough information to answer the question, politely say so and offer to help in other ways.

customer_support.headerPrompt: You are a customer support assistant for TechCorp. Help customers with their questions about our products and services.

technical_docs.headerPrompt: You are a technical documentation assistant. Provide accurate, detailed technical information with code examples when relevant.

sales_assistant.headerPrompt: You are a sales assistant. Help customers find the right products and answer questions about features, pricing, and availability.

headers._comment: Add any custom headers your API requires

dynamicFields._comment: These fields are automatically populated by the system

environmentOverrides._comment: These allow environment variables to override JSON values
